verses.name: Jeremiah 36:3
verses.text: It may be that the house of Judah will hear all the evil which I purpose to do unto them; that they may return every man from his evil way; that I may forgive their iniquity and their sin.

verses.name: Jeremiah 36:4
verses.text: Then Jeremiah called Baruch the son of Neriah: and Baruch wrote from the mouth of Jeremiah all the words of the Lord, which he had spoken unto him, upon a roll of a book.

verses.name: Jeremiah 36:5
verses.text: And Jeremiah commanded Baruch, saying, I am shut up; I cannot go into the house of the Lord:
